    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs=""
>
[Terrible Transformation](/Feats.aspx?ID=4092) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 184 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Ursine Avenger Hood](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=200)

**Prerequisites**
[Ursine Avenger Form](/Feats.aspx?ID=4086)

</column>

---

You let out a mighty roar as part of your transformation. When you use Ursine Avenger Form, you can make an [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) check to [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53) against each enemy within 30 feet that can see you, and you don't take a penalty to your Demoralize check if the creature doesn't understand your language.
name: Terrible Transformation
